frontmatter.title: Tokenomy
frontmatter.description: Building a modern crypto investment platform for Tokenomy

metadata.business-context: Crypto startup needed to expand their platform to reach more customers
metadata.solution: Developed a redesigned web platform and Android app with modern UI and trading features
metadata.outcome: Successfully launched on schedule, allowing Tokenomy to grow their user base and add new features
